attributes.action: Social media ban for children under 16.
attributes.additional_details: Social media can negatively impact youngsters, leading to issues like anxiety, depression, low self-esteem, body image problems, and cyberbullying, as well as sleep disturbances and decreased real-world social skills. It has no educational benefits and is having a huge negative impact on children’s Health.
attributes.background: Make it law that children under the age of 16 can’t access social media. Prosecute the social media companies if this Law is broken.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce 16 as the minimum age for children to have social media
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700086
